word: AT THE TIME OF THE DISAPPOINTMENT ON OCTOBER 22, 1844, MILLER WAS WORN AND ILL. HE DEPENDED LARGELY ON HIS YOUNGER ASSOCIATES WHO STOOD WITH HIM IN PROCLAIMING THE ADVENT MESSAGE. THEY LED HIM TO REJECT THE SABBATH TRUTH AS IT CAME TO HIS ATTENTION SOON AFTER THE DISAPPOINTMENT. FOR THIS THEY, AND NOT WILLIAM MILLER, WILL BE HELD RESPONSIBLE. ELLEN WHITE WRITES OF THIS EXPERIENCE ON PAGE 258, AND ASSURES US THAT MILLER WILL BE AMONG THOSE WHO WILL BE CALLED FROM THEIR GRAVES AT THE SOUND OF THE LAST TRUMP.
